entry.title: [BHS7][Hosted Private Cloud] - Network equipement operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 27, 04:00 - 10:00 UTC

Sep 6, 04:47 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 27/09/2023 04:00 UTC
End time : 27/09/2023 10:00 UTC
Service impact : Impacted services might experience some input/output freezes for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on a network equipment.

entry.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private Cloud] - R806R16 - R806R17 - R806R18
entry.content:
Aug 19, 01:13 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 18/08/2023 18:42 UTC
End Time : 19/08/2023 00:45 UTC
Root cause : Network Equipement Issue.

The issue has been resolved by our technical team.

Aug 18, 20:32 UTC
Update - PCC production is back to normal since 20:06 UTC.

Aug 18, 20:25 UTC
Monitoring - Start time: 18/08/2023 18:42 UTC
User impact : All the servers on these racks are unreachable
Ongoin Actions: Investigating

Aug 18, 19:45 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Aug 18, 19:41 UTC
Investigating - Start time: 18/08/2023 18:42 UTC
User impact :All the servers on these racks are unreachable
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
